snippet: House Democrats on Wednesday unveiled an immigration bill that provides a path to citizenship for the 11 million immigrants living here illegally and tightens border security.
abstract: House Democrats unveil immigration bill that provides path to citizenship for 11 million immigrants living in the United States illegally and tightens border security, and warn of political fallout if House Republicans fail to act.
lead_paragraph: House Democrats on Wednesday unveiled an immigration bill that provides a path to citizenship for the 11 million immigrants living here illegally and tightens border security.
